name: @tagspaces/extensions
description: Providing support for legacy TagSpaces extensions
author: TagSpaces UG <info@tagspaces.org> (https://www.tagspaces.org)

scripts.build: npm run build-media-player && npm run build-md-editor
scripts.build-media-player: cd media-player && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build-md-editor: cd md-editor && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.copy-build: shx cp -rL media-player/build/static media-player && shx cp media-player/build/index.html media-player
scripts.pkg-publish: npm run build && npm run copy-build && npm publish --access public && npm run drop-build
